questions.quote: I had the directions on the seat right next to me, they flew out the window.
What do you think? The brought it over in pieces and screwed it together like a coffee table?
Yeah, twenty-five percent bran flakes. The forty percent was too much so I found a store to mix it up special for me, they take it down another fifteen percent.
You didn't realize? How could you not realize? You're stupid! You're a stupid, stupid man!
You know it's interesting, because I called the hospital and they said you were released on Monday.
I should have quitted at double or nothin'. Travelers checks acceptable?
Hey, can I use your place? I got a bunch of friends coming over this weekend.
Well it's been quite a night I could sure use a cup of coffee.
They wanna have another meeting? They wanna buy it?! They wanna but it?! Oh! I tell you! We're gonna be rich!! What are we gonna get for this? Fifty, sixty thousand?
Why shouldn't we be able to do that once in a while if we want to?
